Name: Satsuma Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tastes like its namesake - hard to believe the recipe comprises almost half apple juice.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2002 at the Fifth Floor Bar, Harvey Nichol's, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Satsuma Cocktail contains 179 calories
